solution_line_template: There is a total of {num_pies} x {slices_per_pie} = <<{num_pies}*{slices_per_pie}={total_slices}>>{total_slices} cookie slices.
There are {num_classmates} + {num_teachers} + {manny} = <<{num_classmates}+{num_teachers}+{manny}={total_people}>>{total_people} people who ate the cookie pieces.
